description: Ś e f a t   y e t e r   ( f r e e   t r a n s l a t i o n   o f   a   g r a m m a t i c a l   t r e a t i s e ,   t o g e t h e r   w i t h   e x t r a c t s   f r o m   A b u ̄   a l - W a l i ̄ d   M a r w a ̄ n   I b n   J a n a ̄ h ̣ ' s   K i t a ̄ b   a l - M u s t a l h ̣ a q )
title: Śefat yeter (free translation of a grammatical treatise, together with extracts from Abū al-Walīd Marwān Ibn Janāḥ's Kitāb al-Mustalḥaq)
author: Ḥayyuj, Judah ben David
